reviewText: I was looking for USB bracelets for my daughter's class to store data for their school paper. This product has it's use, but not what I needed.  This bracelet hooks up through a virtual internet and basically allows the wearer access to products like Microsoft Word and the Internet.  And, money from the bracelet goes to charity which is nice.  I can't say the product is bad, it's just not what I wanted.  Also, the seller was wonderful. I sent the bracelets back and got an immediate refund.  This was my fault for not reading.
